title: Aug 1st Gorgeous 1 Bed Near Beach!! Prkng+Lndry+No Fee!! Nahant
posting_body: Magnificent architecturally historic home steps to ocean with full wrap around porch with ocean sunsets views.
Only 5.5 miles to Logan Airport, 7.7 miles to downtown Boston
Top  floor one bedroom with two large  closets,
open  floor plan with modern kitchen with  stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, electric stove, granite counter tops , living room.
Basement has coin-op laundry with access to back yard.
Hardwood floors throughout, large tree lined yard.
OWNER CHECKS WORK,LANDLORD REFERENCES AND CREDIT CHECK
